summary: This is an email forwarding a Daily Mail article summary about a claim from a new book that Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell first befriended a 13-year-old victim at the Interlochen Center for the Arts in Michigan.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as having 'befriended' a 13-year-old girl at a Michigan arts camp, which is claimed to be his first victim.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as Epstein's associate who also 'befriended' the young girl at the Interlochen Center for the Arts.

connections.description: Described as associates who together befriended a young girl at an arts camp.
Presented together in the context of approaching a potential victim.

events.title: Epstein and Maxwell befriend girl at arts camp
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell 'befriended' a 13-year-old girl at the Interlochen Center for the Arts in Michigan, claimed to be Epstein's first victim.

keyFacts: A claim from a new book alleges Jeffrey Epstein's first victim was a 13-year-old girl.
Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly befriended the girl at the Interlochen Center for the Arts in Michigan.
The incident is said to have occurred at a secluded arts camp in northern Michigan.
